page.title: 07Methodist Chapels
page.content: Coates Methodist Chapel is situated on North Green. We could not find out when it was built,but,according to a carving in a stone above the lamp over the front door it was enlarged in 1866. Services are held each Sunday at 6.30 p.m. The minister is the Reverend J.Staples,who lives at 7,Portland Place,Whittlesey. The chapel has an organ. There is a Sunday School room,but no Sunday School. There is also a Methodist Chapel in Eastrea. This chapel has a Sunday School which is held at 10 a.m. The teacher's name is Mr.Hall. Sometimes we go into the school and sometimes into the chapel. There is a service every Sunday afternoon,taken by dif- ferent person each Sunday,as the chap- el has no permanent minister.
